p: For the biological investigations, lyophilized biomasses and dried herb were extracted five times with methanol in an ultrasonic bath (Polsonic 3, Poland) for 30 min. Extracts were centrifuged, filtered, placed in the crystallizers and evaporated to dryness at room temperature to obtain the following dry extracts: V. officinalis callus culture extract ( Vo-C), V. officinalis suspension culture extract ( Vo-S), V. officinalis stirred-tank bioreactor culture extract ( Vo-STB)and V. officinalis, grown in vivo, herb extract ( Vo-in vivo).
